text: @antonioguterres @WFP @UNICEF True @antonioguterres @WFP and @UNICEF the school feeding programme has been helpful, every child whether rich or poor is guaranteed, at least, a meal a day. Enrollment rates,attendance, Children's love for academics,country  and a brighter is increased. Let's end COVID19 quickly
